ChangeList.Description: Added new **expirationDate** property to the [**educationSynchronizationProfile**](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsynchronizationprofile?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
The [educationTeacher](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationteacher) **externalId** property is now returned when using delegated permissions.
The [educationStudent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationstudent) **externalId** property is now returned when using delegated permissions.
Added **lms** to the list of possible values for **educationExternalSource**.

Added the [classSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamclasssettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) property to the [team](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource to allow callers to get settings specific to a team of type Class.

Added the [classSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamclasssettings?view=graph-rest-beta) property to the [team](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to allow callers to get settings specific to a team of type Class.

Removed [previously announced](https://developer.microsoft.com/onenote/blogs/breaking-change-education-api-updates-in-microsoft-graph-beta) deprecated properties **grade** and **feedback** from [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta). Access grades and feedback only through [educationOutcome](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsubmission-list-outcomes?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new property **closeDateTime** to [educationAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta).

Changed property names **mkcd** to **projectId** and **url** to **hostWebUrl** in [educationMakeCodeResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationMakeCodeResource?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added new property **grade** to [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationClass?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the new [educationRubric](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationRubric?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added APIs to manage [educationRubric](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationRubric?view=graph-rest-beta) resources on [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-beta) and [educationAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the new [educationOutcome](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationOutcome?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added APIs to manage [educationOutcome](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationOutcome?view=graph-rest-beta) resources on [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationSubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the new [educationMakeCodeResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationMakeCodeResource?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added new property **grade** to [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationClass?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added taughtClasses to [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [educationCourse](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationCourse?view=graph-rest-beta) to [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationClass?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview) support to [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview) to [educationSchool](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationSchool?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview) to [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationClass?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added **faculty** option to [educationUserRole](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/enums?view=graph-rest-beta#educationuserrole-values) enumeration.
Add the new [educationCategory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationCategory?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Add APIs to manage [educationCategory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationCategory?view=graph-rest-beta) resources on [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationClass?view=graph-rest-beta) and [educationAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta).
Add the new [educationFormResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationFormResource?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Add the **recipients** property on the [educationAssignmentIndividualRecipient](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationAssignmentIndividualRecipient?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Introduced new relatedContacts property on [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-beta).
Introduced new relatedContacts property on [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Updated the possible values of **educationSubmissionStatus** type in the status property of  [educationsubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **educationAssignmentIndividualRecipient** complex type to the assignTo property of [educationAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationassignment?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **unsubmittedBy**, **unsubmittedDate**, **returnedBy**, **returnedDate** property of [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [return](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsubmission-return?view=graph-rest-beta) and  [unsubmit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsubmission-unsubmit?view=graph-rest-beta) action to [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).
Removed the release and  recall action on [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).

The scope **Members.Read.Hidden** is required to read or update the **Members** collection on an [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationclass?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity using app-only tokens.
Added the reportableIdentifier property to [educationsynchronizationerror](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsynchronizationerror?view=graph-rest-beta).
Updated the response options for the [uploadUrl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsynchronizationprofile-uploadurl?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
Updated the text for description of the [educationSynchronizationError](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsynchronizationerror?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Updated the text for description of the [get sync errors](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsynchronizationerrors-get?view=graph-rest-beta) API.

Added support for education scenarios, including the following resources:, [Schools](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationschool?view=graph-rest-beta), [Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationclass?view=graph-rest-beta), [Users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationuser?view=graph-rest-beta), [Assignments](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationassignment?view=graph-rest-beta), [Submissions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta), See the resource topics for details about the methods that are available.
